lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I've been lucky in life and was raised in a good family,in a safe environment, with plenty of food on the table and loving parents. I was able to overcome learning challenges and now live a good life with my life partner Jeff.
lender.occupational_info: I'm an entrepreneur who helps businesses increase their net income and help larger businesses understand their data.

lender.loan_because: I care

lender.name: Imran
lender.occupation: Would you like to earn money each week for

lender.name: Demeter

lender.name: Ben, Emma, Demond & Mimi
lender.loan_because: A sweet friend gave us a gift certificate to get started.
lender.occupational_info: Working hard in school

lender.name: Isaac
lender.loan_because: I like to help especially single mothers because my foster sister and I were raised by a single mother who had no where and no one to turn to in time financial difficulties
lender.occupational_info: Used to own a restuarant but now working as a cook in Stockholm

lender.name: Honza

lender.name: Sheri
lender.occupation: Certified Financial Planner, mother of two sons
lender.loan_because: I want to help resourceful people make the most of what they already have.
lender.occupational_info: I help people make smart choices about their money so they achieve their goals.

lender.name: James & Dorothy
lender.loan_because: Many people need help and I can help even in small ways.
lender.occupational_info: Currently retired but in my career I helped communities and several states attract and expand business enterprises.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: It takes money to make money.
lender.occupational_info: I am the 1%

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I love the idea of being able to help people help themselves. Seeing the individuals and their stories is inspiring

lender.name: Ms. Erika
lender.loan_because: I love Zaid
lender.occupational_info: I get paid to have fun with kids all day.

lender.name: The van Thiel Family
lender.loan_because: We believe that everyone deserves a fair chance to make a life for themselves.

lender.name: Nocona
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: Opportunities are unequally distributed; those who have more should share
lender.occupational_info: I study the effects of adversity on children's behavioral development

lender.name: Andrea
lender.loan_because: we are all One.
lender.occupational_info: I assist people (including myself) to realize the unlimited potential of our higher consciousness.

lender.name: DaveB
lender.loan_because: I want to help people to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: Accessible web design

lender.name: Denis
lender.loan_because: As I travel accross the world I find that I can only truly help people by going through institutions such as Kiva .
lender.occupational_info: I live with my wife. and do all the cooking in the house.I am a retired school teacher who has more time to spend with his family. I have one son and a daughter who both have their own family. I also have a grand son and two grand-daughters. I also do some fishing and hunting as sports. I grow tomatoes on my balcony.

lender.name: Gary
lender.loan_because: The story of the Good Samaritan

lender.name: Emmanuel Lambert
lender.loan_because: I believe in microcredits as a sustainable way of fighting poverty.

lender.name: Tiago
lender.loan_because: Some people need it more than me.

lender.name: Cadence
lender.loan_because: Someone needs it more than I do. We're all connected. I consider it an honor to be able to help someone improve their quality of life--especially in developing parts of the world. I wanna save the world, even if I have to do it one person at a time.
lender.occupational_info: Underappreciated, underpaid, stressful but rewarding. It keeps me humble. I'm a work in progress but I've no regrets thus far.

lender.name: Bradley
lender.loan_because: Access to capital for small business is minimal. This is a marvelous way to help small business owners succeed.
lender.occupational_info:
I am a CPA. In most parts of the world, the term is "Chartered Accountant". I work with small business owners, providing financial and tax planning.
I also play instrumental guitar. While I don't make any money with my music, it is a big part of my life.

lender.name: Akash
lender.loan_because: its the right thing to do
lender.occupational_info: A person who is just trying to make a difference in other peoples lives; one small loan at a time.

lender.name: Faith
lender.loan_because: I want to contribute to the planet.. and help women in poorer countries.

lender.name: Connie
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do. We have so much.
lender.occupational_info: I write fiction from the stories of my life, and I paint large, colorful canvases

lender.name: Susana
lender.loan_because: small individual actions can make a big difference

lender.name: Kimberly
lender.loan_because: i can.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: I want to help other people achieve their goals
lender.occupational_info: Improve safety conditions for employees

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: I like sustainable ways to encourage development and innovation in the developing world.
lender.occupational_info: I make websites.

lender.name: Curtis
lender.loan_because: I believe that it can make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I work in international education.

lender.name: Joe
lender.loan_because: For the benefit of others.

lender.name: Jerry
lender.loan_because: As a Christian I am called to help the poor. And it gives me great joy to share my blessings with others.
lender.occupational_info: I am a husband, father, and grandfather. In addition to that I pastor a local church and coach other pastors and churches.

lender.name: Joy
lender.loan_because: I think everyone should have a chance.

lender.name: kristin
lender.loan_because: I can. A small amount can make a difference.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: I have so much, and it's easy to share. It's inspiring to see the power of an entrepreneurial spirit to change a family's life.
lender.occupational_info: I help children who feel very sad or worried learn how to handle these feelings. I also help parents learn how to help their children feel better after something sad or scary happens.

lender.name: Kavapoint
lender.loan_because: we want to make the world a better place and our hope is that the people we lend to will also help to make this world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: We make computer software.

lender.name: King
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping others help themselves. After visiting Nigeria on a mission trip, I am particularly interested in those in Benin City, Nigeria.
lender.occupational_info: I retired from the insurance business and now work part time grading the written portion of school system exams.

lender.name: Cartic
lender.loan_because: I feel it will make a diffrence to someone in need
lender.occupational_info: Design backup and recovery solutions for computer data

lender.name: Siobhan Green
lender.loan_because: I also own a small business and I know how important capital is to creating and growing a business. And small businesses are the backbone of economic development
lender.occupational_info: My company builds websites and software for businesses and government. We also create training via the web and cell phones.

lender.name: Kathy & Jim
lender.loan_because: A little goes such a long way. Kiva makes it so easy.
lender.occupational_info: Kathy helps people rehabilitate after and accident, injury, or surgery. Jim flies a corporate jet. He retired from the US Coast Guard in 2005.

lender.name: Ian
lender.loan_because: I saw the PBS television FRONTLINE special on micro-finance. I have also participated in the One Laptop per Child G1G1 program.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Business Administration student.

lender.name: Rabin
lender.loan_because: I love to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student.

lender.name: Grant
lender.occupational_info: I help companies hire people via their web pages on the internet.

lender.name: Lorelei
lender.loan_because: Lending helps.

lender.name: Tony
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of people sharing a common vision. I have benefited from the trust and help of others and I'm compelled to do the same.
lender.occupational_info: I work with people and help businesses solve people-related challenges.

lender.name: Cris
lender.loan_because: life is hard now everywhere. My own work has severely dwindled, yet I am mindful of what I have and what I want to be able to give when there are so many with much less than I have. While I cannot give a lot, being able to pool my money with others of like mind, makes it possible for me to do what I could not accomplish on my own. It is enriching to see the people whom we help with these loans and see their aspirations realized.
lender.occupational_info: I am an artist who works in digital art and 3D texturing and modeling.

lender.name: Kathy
lender.loan_because: I believe everyone needs a chance to succeed.

lender.name: Rog and Pam
lender.loan_because: We think every little helps. Would like to do more if we could.

lender.name: Joshua
lender.loan_because: I loan because Christ helped the poor and needy and I desire to be more like Him. I loan because i want to share the love of Christ. I loan because people need help to break the cycle of poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I am the Operations Manager of Campus for Christ, a Christian movement that help inspire others to go on a faith adventure to discover Jesus Christ.

lender.name: hannah
lender.loan_because: Because a small amount of money to me can mean a huge amount to someone else. You have to help people help themselves
lender.occupational_info: juts trying to make my way in the non-profit sector

lender.name: Roy
lender.loan_because: someone said " I have a dream..." and my guess is he's not the only one....
lender.occupational_info: paramedic in the city of Amsterdam

lender.name: ermina
lender.loan_because: because i need to improve my business and to make more peanut butter so that i cant short my delivery to my client.
lender.occupational_info: it is not o hard but its a good business for my family so that my kids can continue their studies studies.

lender.name: Olander
lender.loan_because: I believe in small enterprises and know it sometimes takes only small steps to achieve a lot.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: I am a doctor who has been treating people with blood pressure for several years. I wants to share my expertise with people suffering from blood pressure so that they are able to benefit from my advice.

lender.name: Greg & Miriam
lender.loan_because: We want to help others who work hard to achieve their dreams -- such small investments go a long way and can make the world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: Greg is a Consultant supporting advanced technology development and Miriam is a Certified Financial Planner.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I am able.
lender.occupational_info: Child Care.

lender.name: Morten
lender.loan_because: It ain't the money you've got, no it's the money you spend

lender.name: Jeena
lender.loan_because: I like human beings.
lender.occupational_info: I am a programmer.

lender.name: Ken & Mandy
lender.loan_because: We see Kiva as an amazing way to help those who want to improve their standard of living through small business development. Our daughter and son-in-law (Sarah/Justin) are world travelers and have a heart for helping others. They introduced us to Kiva at their wedding as a way of saying thank you to their wedding quests (donation to Kiva) instead of wedding favours.

lender.name: HARVEY
lender.loan_because: THIS IS A WONDERFUL CONCEPT THAT ENRICHES TWO LIVES

lender.name: Mike & Maleaha
lender.loan_because: the funds that we lend here will do far more good than sitting in a bank account. We have made so many friends in the developing world that need just a bit of credit...
lender.occupational_info: Helping other people in various ways through our jobs.

lender.name: Derek + Stephanie
lender.loan_because: My wife and I were introduced to this website on our wedding day from a very close friend who chose to start an account in our name as our wedding gift. We understand how blessed we are to have each other and choose to give back in honor of the love we share. Thank you to Zaid and Erika for allowing us to begin our marriage in the spirit of charity, pride, and love.

lender.name: Santiago
lender.loan_because: I hope to make a difference in parts of that world that are less fortunate than my own.

lender.loan_because: this is my first time loaning. it is to a baker in samoa.
lender.occupational_info: i don't work

lender.loan_because: we've been very lucky in life.

lender.name: Anthony
lender.occupational_info: I trade stocks and futures for my own account

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: I would like to make the world a better place

lender.name: Tim
lender.loan_because: I am learning that the only way you yourself can truely be safe, healthy and free is to ensure that everyone else is.
lender.occupational_info: I am the founder and president of Junk my Car (junkmycar.com). Junk my Car provides vehicle removal and recycling service throughout the United States and Canada.

lender.name: Don
lender.loan_because: This world belongs to all of us and it is everyone's responsibility to do whatever they can to make life better for all.

lender.name: Francisville
lender.loan_because: I want to help people improve their own lives, leading to the creation of a better world. I want the Democraitc Duchy of Francisville to do all we can to help!

lender.name: Kerstin
lender.loan_because: A small contribution in a big world. I like that information technology can bring people closer together.
lender.occupational_info: Manager for a team of IT project managers

lender.name: George Burkhard
lender.loan_because: Empowering women has been shown to stabilize communities and displace corruption in government.

lender.name: Felix
lender.loan_because: I believe this is a good way to fight poverty, and I really do want to trigger changes. It pains me to think of all the unlucky people who hardly get by.
lender.occupational_info: I study a mixture of business and administration and production engineering. this hybrid major is quite a German thing, nevertheless very interesting. Currently I want to alter my technical focus a little and deepen my knowledge of sustainability in business and renewable energies.

lender.occupational_info: I encourage and assist high school students in going to college!

lender.name: Sammie
lender.loan_because: I believe microfinance is the way to end poverty in the world and I am passionate about helping others!
lender.occupational_info: I work in a library, I read a lot and help other people find great books to read as well :) I graduate from college in May and hope to gain a job in microfinance so I can help others attain a better life.

lender.name: Claire
lender.loan_because: I want to take care of the world we live in, and the people who live on it.
lender.occupational_info: I study many things to prepare for a career and a meaningful life.

lender.name: Johann
lender.loan_because: Everybody deserves a chance.

lender.name: Bill
lender.loan_because: I have been given many opportunities and want to share these with others

lender.name: Stephen
lender.loan_because: I don't have much to give, so I'm able to re-loan and possibly achieve a greater impact.
lender.occupational_info: On a weekly basis I handle medications that cost more than motor vehicles.

lender.name: Holy Empire of Reunion
lender.loan_because: The Holy Empire of Réunion believes that micronationalism may also serve as a way to help people in need, and specially enterpreneurs and businessmen who are starting their lives to become successful individuals.
lender.occupational_info: The Holy Empire of Réunion is a political simulation, a community which unites almost 800 people from all over the world who wish to construct an ideal country.

lender.name: Mark Frisoli
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of entrepreneurs to lift themselves out of poverty, and help create sustainable growth not only for themselves but for their communities.
lender.occupational_info: I own/manage a company that invests in a wide range of companies, securities, and asset classes to generate the greatest return for its shareholders.

lender.name: DeeJah
lender.loan_because: This is my world. I love my world. We are all One and have a common desire to move forward and better our position. I have loaned because I care and because I am able. I just keep recycling the loans. Thank you God.
lender.occupational_info: Now I am an Awesome Administrative Assistant. I am the glue that holds it all together.

lender.name: Deborah
lender.loan_because: because God so loved the world ...

lender.name: WB
lender.occupational_info: I grow oranges in the Central Valley of California.

lender.name: Steve & Louise
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves support and I think that Kiva's direct loan model is superb.

lender.name: Christopher
lender.loan_because: It is up to my generation to right the world, and now is as good a time as any to start.
lender.occupational_info: I am studying biochemistry, political science, and chemistry.

lender.name: David & Tanner
lender.loan_because: this is a great way to show my son and remind myself that life is about more than just us.

lender.name: Jacob
lender.loan_because: everyone needs a break once in a while.

lender.name: Kate
lender.loan_because: Loaning... as little as $25.00 Time spent at computer... minutes Energy expended... less than walking to the refrigerator Feeling I got from my first loan... PRICELESS!
lender.occupational_info: I help raise money for a Christian Hospital that cares for everyone who enters, regardless as to age, race, need or ability to pay.

lender.name: Bernadette
lender.loan_because: If a women has a dream to start a business, money shouldn't prevent her from following her dream.
lender.occupational_info: I own a restaurant. I love cooking and interacting with my customers. It's hard work but, very gratifying.

lender.occupational_info: I work with computer systems.

lender.occupational_info: promoting the use of renewable energy such as solar panels and wind turbines

lender.loan_because: I want to help women launch their businesses--and change their lives.
lender.occupational_info: E-card company featuring original photography from around the world--helps people stay in touch and support charitable organizations.

lender.name: Felisa
lender.loan_because: I want to push a buy and sell medicinal wine in my region but I dont have much money to raise it...so it come up to my mind to be a member of Kiva Organization
lender.occupational_info: I am unemployed since June 2004. I dont have source of income but my friend offered me a buy and sell medicinal wine. A wine that extracted from ginger, turmeric and duhat but my problem is I need enough money to finance it all. Since I do have alot of pending orders

lender.name: Joel
lender.loan_because: I have so much to be thankful for.
lender.occupational_info: I try to help people find what they're really looking for.

lender.name: ponny
lender.loan_because: i want to help my husband increase his buisness,i want to open caffe at mt house to increase our income.my husaband recieved a mobile phone repairing.he is very hard workers so do i.
lender.occupational_info: my husband repairing a mobile phone and i help him.

lender.name: Diane Marcelle
lender.loan_because: I can make a difference in the life of a person who can benefit greatly from my small loan.

lender.name: Travis
lender.loan_because: I care.
lender.occupational_info: It isn't easy, but I enjoy what I do and I get a chance to travel. :-)

lender.name: Emma
lender.loan_because: I have disposable income. What's a few cups of coffee or a new book to making it possible for someone to improve their lot in life?
lender.occupational_info: I earn a ridiculously generous hourly wage by putting away books in the correct order, and watching the children who use the books.

lender.name: Jawad
lender.loan_because: Others deserve to have a great opportunity that some of us are lucky to have

lender.name: Dojendra
lender.loan_because: to increase production
lender.occupational_info: at first i am student plus farmer so i can work in farm by taking advice throw agricuture officer so can increase productin more......

lender.name: Glen
lender.loan_because: It feels great to give.
lender.occupational_info: Papa

lender.name: Uljyana
lender.loan_because: Hello. I have a home kindergarten. I have been in preschool children. Since the country's crisis, we do not have enough money to rent the premises.
lender.occupational_info: Kindergarten I opened in May 2006. Small. Home. Nursery for preschool children. In the group with 5 - 7 children. Working system Zaitsev, Montessori.

lender.name: Cody W. Johnson, Esq.
lender.loan_because:
I started my business with a micro family loan - several of them.
Now I've got 400+ employees and factories and offices all over the world.
Given the chance, entrepreneurs all over the world can make a huge positive social difference. I want to be part of that at a grass roots level.
lender.occupational_info: I manage a multi-national company that manufactures molded rubber products for a variety of industries.

lender.name: ANILKUMAR
lender.occupation: own business - eticketing - property agent . EO

lender.name: Vera
lender.loan_because: Little things make big things happen

lender.name: Lori
lender.loan_because: I can and I should.
lender.occupational_info: I work in an alternative school for students who are in trouble and need more guidance. We teach them but also counsel them for their needs. After about two months (if they are ready), they go back to their regular campus.

lender.name: Marie-Claude
lender.loan_because: Being myself an entrepreneur, I am glad to help other individuals succeed in creating their own jobs.
lender.occupational_info: I translate technical documents from German, Spanish, English and French into English and French.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: I want to help people and make a difference.

lender.name: Sheridan
lender.loan_because: I love the idea of helping people to start or develop their own businesses. I am a publisher and I help people to start their own local magazines and run their own businesses in the UK.
lender.occupational_info: I got married to Mike in October 09 and we started this team so friends and family could lend through Kiva instead of giving us wedding presents. We live at Touchdown House, a crazy Georgian house in Wootton Bassett, with our ten kids and a giant fibreglass Kung Fu Panda!

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: this idea has to be suppoted to make a better world.

lender.occupational_info: Writer, grandmother, volunteer

lender.name: Manuela
lender.loan_because: I believe in individual creativity and ability to improve one's lives.
lender.occupational_info: I am an educator. I teach in a university and I learn from my students as much as I learn.

lender.name: laura lou
lender.loan_because: we do not exist for ourselves

lender.name: Kristin
lender.loan_because: God has so richly blessed me I want to share his love with others.
